text:
Ganaz | Head of Engineering | San Francisco or Seattle | Onsite | Full-time

Ganaz is a new tech company that aims to improve the lives of the 1.3 million farmworkers who grow our food. We help farmworkers find jobs, communicate better with their employer, and share their feedback on how their employers can improve.

We're in Techstars Seattle and preparing for a Seed round raise in April.

We're looking for amazing world-changers who want to join our team - learn more at www.ganaz.com/hiring.
